name: Xeno (Decratos)
description:
In a laboratory located in an exo-planet, scientists, studying xenomorph, are making experiences on young alien captured on this planet. The first subject has suffered several chemicals tests wich degraded its visuals capacity.  It now must use its sensorial capacity to escape this complexe, and avoid other tests that may be even worse than the first ones...

To follow the updates make sure to follow my Twitter

Objective

In this demo, only a little level is available where you must find and take an egg and find the exit door.

Controls

You can move using the WASD key or the right joystick of your Xbox controller (PS controller are currently not mapped, I will work on this for the final update)




The alien is capable to move on the ceiling with the F key or the A button on the controller, this mechanic affect the movement

You can attack with your tail when you are behind an ennemy with the left mouse button or the X button of your controller

To avoid confrontation or play stealthy, you can throw an object to distract the ennemies with the C key or the button, this result on the alien throwing an object wich produce sound on impact.





What I plan for the future :

- A bigger level with multiples floor wich have their theme
- A 3D model for the patroller
- 2 more ennemy types
- More props and 3D models for the ennemies
